meanings.sent1: She wore a chic dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The boutique sells chic clothing for young adults.
meanings.sent3: His chic hat matched perfectly with his shoes.
meanings.sent4: The chic design of the new car turned heads on the street.
meanings.sent5: The chic hairstyle made her stand out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: The actress looked chic in her red carpet outfit.
meanings.sent2: The chic furniture in the room gave it a modern feel.
meanings.sent3: Even in casual wear, she managed to look chic.
meanings.sent4: The chic accessories completed her elegant look.
meanings.sent5: His chic watch added a touch of sophistication to his attire.

meanings.definition: Smart elegance and sophistication of dress or manner
meanings.sent1: Her chic was admired by everyone at the event.
meanings.sent2: The magazine featured the latest trends in chic.
meanings.sent3: He tried to imitate the chic of the fashion models.
meanings.sent4: The chic of the royal family was well-known worldwide.
meanings.sent5: In her chic, she exuded confidence and grace.
